title: Georgia - Poverty rate 2000 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Percentage of population, containing a total of 19 data points.
Overall Percentage of population has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Percentage of population, about 19.2 was reported at Year 2012
Minimum Percentage of population about 11.7 was reached at Year 2001
